content: bobbles optional designed by melissa clulow bobbles optional is a generously proportioned yoke sweater with long straight sleeves and a modern slightly cropped silhouette worked from the top-down short row are worked after the neckband and plain and bobble stripes are alternated throughout as the name suggests the bobbles are entirely optional and can be substituted with plain stripes
